TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1554=Individuals and political action committees associated with the industry contributed nearly $16.3 million during the 2008 campaign cycle, with 60 percent going to Republicans. The industry has been a steady supporter of the GOP for the last two decades, regularly giving 70 percent or more of its contributions to Republicans. Democrats have never received a majority of the industry's contributions. [Read more Background]}
